cards.content:
This theme was made by and is being hosted by cj81499.

Reddit Post

Icon Requests

If you want to redistribute the icons, get permision first.

If you post a setup using this pack, please mention me in the post. I'm /u/cj81499 on Reddit and @cjMakesIcons on Twitter.

Alternate icons have "ALT" after the @2x. When I make another style for an icon, it either replaces the default or becomes an ALT. I don't include new ALTs in the changelog. Remove the ALT after the @2x to use it instead of the default.

Enable BOTH cjGlyphs and Glyphs with cjGlyphs above Glyphs.

Version 1.48 (4/15/2017)

It's been a while. I hope the larger than normal number of icons somewhat makes up for that.

Added Settings Theme! (Needs revision)

Added Coolors, Euchre 3D, Bitmoji, uMagic, Bloons TD (4, 5, and Battles), Gboard, 2048, Infinity Loop, Eluo, Speedtest.net, Narwhal, Vainglory, Tunnelbear

Updated Netflix


Version 1.47 (8/22/2016)

Dependency changes. Should default to Anemone instead of Winterboard now.


Version 1.46 (8/17/2016)

Added Cut the Rope, Piano Tiles, Photoshop Mobile, Psych, Quizlet, Quizup, Road Trip 2, Union

Updated Clash Royale, iCleaner Pro, Passbook/Wallet (I was wrong about being happy. I think I am now though.)

Added 19 new icons: AntRec, Terminal, Appster, JW Library, CloudBeats, Chunky Comic Reader, PDF Expert 5, Bundlr, MovieBox, Alto's Adventure, Screenshot Maker Pro, Glit, CVS Pharmacy, USAA, Venmo, Citi, Line, Viber, Camfrog
